g.text:
You are an IT dog, You need to collect all IT can food before reaching
the end point. Use the A key to go left. Use the D key to go right and
W key to jump. Ghost (QA) are goint to stop you on the way. Use the
Spacebar to shoot and kill them. Pick up the can food and go to the
exit quickly. You can earn double points in zoom mode which is
much harder. If you watch the ghost, they will feeze!! Protal will
help you.
wlyiuaa0499
